```py
import numpy as np

x = np.array(42)
print(x)
print('A scalar is of rank %d' %(x.ndim))
```

```py
x = np.array([1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8])
print(x)
print('A vector is of rank %d' %(x.ndim))
```

```py
x = np.array([[1, 4, 7],
              [2, 5, 8],
              [3, 6, 9]])
print(x)
print('A matrix is of rank %d' %(x.ndim))
```
